Translations.Text: Others them schemed en des preter, consequently DI detru their mason fundament kauxz tegment fal them. retribution strik them when ili malplej expected
Tiam Tag Resurrection Li disgrace them pet Kie est My partners vi set Me opposed Me por their sake? Those ben kun knowledge dir Hodiaux fi mizer befallen disbelievers
Angxel put them death sxtat de wronging their anim! Est when ili finally submit dir Ni ne do anything wrong Jes ja! DI EST fully aware da CXIO VI done
Do enter gates Infer wherein vi abide forever Ki miserable destiny por arrogant unu
As por righteous when ili pet Ki do vi opini da these revelations el your Lord ili dir Bon. those plumb righteous life happiness; abode Hereafter est eben bon! Ki blissful abode por des righteous
Gxarden Eden rezerv them wherein river flu. Ili hav anything ili wish therein. DI TIEL REKOMPENC DES righteous
Angxel terminate their viv en sxtat righteousness dir Pac est vi! Enter Paradise (tuj) rekompenc your works
Ili waiting angxel est ven them aux your Lord's judgment ven pas? Those antaux them did sam ajx! DI EST UNU wronged them; ILI est UNU wronged their own ANIM
Ili incurred consequences their evil works tre ajx ili ridiculed ven haunt them
